kpi.name: M1022C182

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH/DCH PACKET CALL ATT FOR STREAMING
kpi_info.use: The number of HS-DSCH/DCH packet call attempts for the streaming traffic class. UPDATED: When the UE-specific packet scheduler attempts to allocate an HS-DSCH/DCH transport channel for the PS Streaming RAB, and there are no dedicated/shared channels that are already allocated for the RAB.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH/DCH PACKET CALL ATT FOR STREAMING
